post:
Hi folks,

Sharing some special deals. We are new here & want people to _try our services_ so came up with this idea. All prices are recurring.
<br>
## AMD EPYC Powered IPv6-only VPS at too good prices (starting £1/mo monthly.) available in NYC 🇺🇸, NL 🇳🇱 & SG 🇸🇬.
_Shared IPv4 connectivity available for free on request - open support ticket_

What makes it special?

* Min. Monthly commitment starting £1/mo. (even better deals on yearly payment)
* Fast latest generation hardware (AMD EPYC CPU, ECC DDR4 ram, etc.)
* Exotic location included (Singapore)
* Free IPv4 connectivity, you get 21 ports + domain forwarding on port 80/443 for free, please open support ticket after order.
* Weekly Backups
*  Not Oversold - You can use all of your allotted resources anytime
<br>
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
<center>

| **VPS-512**                                       | **VPS-1G**                                        | **VPS-2G**                                        |
|-----------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| 1 x vCore **EPYC 7302p @ 3.0Ghz**                 | 1 x vCore **EPYC 7302p @ 3.0Ghz**                 | 2 x vCore **EPYC 7302p @ 3.0Ghz**                 |
| 512 MB DDR4 RAM                               | 1024 MB DDR4 RAM                              | 2GB DDR4 RAM                                  |
| 7GB NVMe Raid 10 Disk                         | 15GB NVMe Raid 10 Disk                        | 25GB NVMe Raid 10 Disk                        |
| 1 x IPv6 address (Additional free on request) | 1 x IPv6 address (Additional free on request) | 1 x IPv6 address (Additional free on request) |
| 750 GB Transfer @ 1gbit                       | 1000 GB Transfer @ 1gbit                      | 2500 GB Transfer @ 1gbit                      |
| **Price: £1 /month**                              | **Price: £1.9 /month**                            | **Price: £3.2 /month**                            |


> Shared IPv4 connectivity can be added in all plans(21 ports + domain forwarding on port 80/443) - please open ticket
> _No coupon code required_
> Link: https://webhorizon.in/clients/order/main/index/vps

-------------------------------------------------------------------

**Dedicated Email Hosting**
We also have an EMAIL hosting special deal, use coupon AUG42020 for flat 45% off on all plans recurring, valid for 10 uses.

_Example - Mail-4G_

* 4GB Storage Space
* Unlimited Domains
* Unlimited Email Accounts
* SMTP, IMAP, POP3 Protocols
* Roundcube, Rainloop, CrossBox Clients
* High Reputation IP's
* 300 Outbound Emails / Hour
* Mobile App for IOS & Android
* Free NextCloud Integration + 10GB storage
* [Unique Outbound Infrastructure](https://mxroute.com/our-unique-outbound-infrastructure/ "Unique Outbound Infrastructure") highest mail-delivery rates.
* Powered by MXroute

> All for just **£4.1/yr** now! Larger plans are also available.
> Use **coupon code: AUG42020**
> Link: https://webhorizon.in/clients/order/main/index/email
</center>
<br>
